PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-05222013-05-02,  ,  ,  ,  ,  FIN
ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment made by the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada of STEPHEN S. POLOZ of Ottawa, Ontario, as Governor of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour, for a term of seven years, effective June 3, 2013.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the appointment made by the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada of STEPHEN S. POLOZ of Ottawa, Ontario, as Governor of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour, for a term of seven years, effective June 3, 2013.
